caption.p: Greening (LAI increase) and browning trends during 1981–2016 in the northern high latitudes. Statistically significant (Mann–Kendall test, p < 0.1) trends in summer (June–August) average LAI are color coded. Non-significant changes are shown in gray. White areas depict ice sheets or barren land. Details of the LAI data set are provided in Methods. The figure was created using the cartographic python library Cartopy (Release: 0.16.0)
